title: Development of Chemistry MOOC Electronic Content Modules: A Collaboration-Based Short-Intensive Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational chemistry theory and comprehension of experimental methodologies
context.additional_context: Practicum-focused modules designed to strengthen job application skills for current professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three molecular structure analysis techniques in collaborative learning environments using chemistry MOOC digital content.
Learners can present real-world industry problem-solving cases in chemistry experiment design by leveraging digital network resources based on connectivism theory.
Learners can comparatively evaluate at least two chemical reaction simulation tools in blended (online-offline) environments according to the interaction equivalence theorem.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
